word: In the past Elder Daniells has had little faith that a school would ever be in successful operation here, but he has been thoroughly converted on this subject. Had it not been for his unbelief and dissatisfaction in regard to the location of the school in Cooranbong, we would now be two years in advance of where we are.--Letter 132, 1897, p. 3. (To Dear Sister Wessels, June 24, 1897.)
